name: The Deadly Tower of Monsters
description:
This script will install "The Deadly Tower of Monsters" GOG edition.
During install please let all options by default.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

input_menu.description: Please choose your preferred language for subtitles:

execute.command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters"; rm -f -r __support goggame-1458826738.* language_setup.* webcache.zip;

cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters"; sed -i "s/^Language=.*/Language=$INPUT_LANG/" Engine/Config/BaseEngine.ini; sed -i -e "s/ResX=.*/ResX=$RESOLUTION_WIDTH/" -e "s/ResY=.*/ResY=$RESOLUTION_HEIGTH/" -e "s/Fullscreen=.*/Fullscreen=True/" -e "s/UseVsync=.*/UseVsync=True/" Engine/Config/BaseSystemSettings.ini;

script.custom-name: The Deadly Tower of Monsters - GOG - Wine

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters/Binaries/Win32/TS.exe

content:
custom-name: The Deadly Tower of Monsters - GOG - Wine
execute:
  command: cd $GAMEDIR; rm -f -r __support goggame-1458826738.* language_setup.* webcache.zip
files:
- gog: N/A:Please select the Humble archive 1
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters/Binaries/Win32/TS.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: gog
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters
    src: $CACHE/app
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- input_menu:
    description: 'Please choose your preferred language for subtitles:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - INT: English
    - FRA: French
    - DEU: German
    - CHN: Chinese
    - ITA: Italian
    - RUS: Russian
    - ESN: Spanish
    preselect: INT
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters"; rm -f -r
      __support goggame-1458826738.* language_setup.* webcache.zip;
- execute:
    command: cd "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/The Deadly Tower of Monsters"; sed -i
      "s/^Language=.*/Language=$INPUT_LANG/" Engine/Config/BaseEngine.ini; sed -i
      -e "s/ResX=.*/ResX=$RESOLUTION_WIDTH/" -e "s/ResY=.*/ResY=$RESOLUTION_HEIGTH/"
      -e "s/Fullscreen=.*/Fullscreen=True/" -e "s/UseVsync=.*/UseVsync=True/" Engine/Config/BaseSystemSettings.ini;
wine:
  Desktop: true
